notes: Modern apartment in a high-rise building (6F/13F) in Wenshan district, managed by Tuo An Real Estate. The unit features a spacious living room with large sliding glass doors to a balcony, a well-equipped kitchen with modern white cabinetry and a large stainless steel refrigerator, and at least two bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and AC units. For baby safety, the balcony has glass railings with metal frames that appear adequately spaced, but the floor-to-ceiling windows in bedrooms could be a concern; the coffee table in the living room has sharp corners. Overall the apartment is clean, bright with good natural light, and in good condition â€” a suitable family home at ~30 ping with no major red flags, though the description is minimal (just an agent ad placeholder).
